name: Nathaniel Cho
text:
[reaction] When you deal damage to an enemy by an event or a fight ability on an event: Deal 1 additional damage. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, return an event from your discard pile to your hand.
back_flavor: When up-and-coming boxer Nathaniel Cho was offered lots of dough for a title fight, he thoughts he'd finally hit the big time. But his promoter turned out to be part of the notorious O'Bannion gang, and Nathaniel was pressured to fix fights by taking a dive every now and then. His refusal led to his brother Randall's "accident." Nathaniel is rightly fed up with the mobsters endangering Arkham's citizens on a nightly basis. Now he puts his fists to better use, patrolling the streets and defending others from harm. But he's about to find out there are much more dangerous things that lurk in the shadows of Arkham than simple gangsters...
back_text: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Randall Cho, Tommy Malloy, 1 random basic weakness.

name: Randall Cho
text: Nathaniel Cho deck only. This card has not yet been announced and is a placeholder.

name: Tommy Malloy
text: This card has not yet been announced and is a placeholder.

name: Boxing Gloves
text:
You get +1 [combat] while fighting.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Boxing Gloves: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Spirit]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Clean Them Out
text: Fight. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.

name: Counterpunch
text: Fast. Play after an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled. Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy.

flavor: Nathaniel is renowned for his rapid left jab and right cross signature move.
name: One-Two Punch
text: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may fight that enemy again. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for that attack.

name: "Get over here!"
text: Fast. Play during any [free] window. Engage. Fight. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy up to 2 locations away. Move that enemy to your location, engage it, and attack it.

name: Lesson Learned
text:
Fast. Play after you take damage from an enemy attack.
Discover 2 clues at your location.
